alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 2:47PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Natrona County through 315 PM MDT... At 247 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midwest, or 28 miles southeast of Kaycee, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Midwest around 300 PM MDT. Edgerton around 305 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 217 and 237. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County
